headline: WATCH: DeSantis announces wife's final radiation treatment
author: Julia Johnson
sentences:
BTW, for my final radiation treatment they played Sweet Florida by the Van Zant brothers g'??g?
(to my radiation team, thank you for everything) pic.twitter.com/i6jAFEgPYy
 Casey DeSantis (@FLCaseyDeSantis) April 29, 2022
Casey DeSantis was diagnosed with breast cancer, the governor revealed last year.
"I'm also really excited to be able to announce that this morning was my wife and the first lady's final radiation treatment," he said at a press conference as those in attendance cheered.
"At the end of the day, it was not an easy thing for anyone to go through, but I can tell you that the prognosis couldn't be better, and I look forward to her being out and about."
BTW, for my final radiation treatment they played 'Sweet Florida' by the Van Zant brothers (to my radiation team, thank you for everything)."
His wife wrote, "There are no words to express how truly blessed, grateful and humbled I am to hear the words cancer free.
"We really appreciate everyone who's prayed for her and for us over these many, many months," he continued.
Ron DeSantis announced Friday that first lady Casey DeSantis completed her last radiation treatment.
In January, he announced that his wife completed her final chemotherapy treatment.

Thank you for all the prayers g?
and yes, Governor, cant wait to come back!
Thank you for all the prayers  and yes, Governor, cant wait to come back!
Providing an update in March, he said the first lady was free of cancer.
Casey DeSantis tweeted the video out, writing, "Trust in God.
Have faith and stay strong," after the announcement.
To those who are in the fight, know there is hope.
